S04bsu035_u:56_6_0: tena vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekaiḥ [Bagchi_39]
S04bsu035_u:56_7: teṣāṃ ca manuṣyarājānāmasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ cārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:56_8: paritrāṇaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:56_9: teṣāṃ ca rājakulānāṃ teṣāṃ ca rāṣṭrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:56_10: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:56_11: tāṃśca viṣayān sarvabhayopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayiṣyāmaḥ paracakrāṇi ca pratinivartayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:57_0: yaḥ kaścit tasya manuṣyarājasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śroturmānayituḥ pūjayituranyaḥ sāmantakaḥ pratiśatrurājā bhavet /
S04bsu035_u:57_1: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatro rājña evaṃ cittamutpādet /
S04bsu035_u:57_2: so 'haṃ caturaṅgena balakāyena sārdhamasya viṣayamupasaṃkrameyaṃ vināśayitum /
S04bsu035_u:57_3_0: tena khalu punarbhadanta bhagavān kālena tena samayenāsya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya
S04bsu035_u:57_3_1: sūtrendrarājasya tejo 'nubhāvena tasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasyānyai rājabhiḥ
S04bsu035_u:57_8: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasya svaviṣayagatānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānopadravaśatāni nānāvyakṣepaśatāni bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:57_9: sa ca bhadanta bhagavan sāmantakapratiśatrurājaścaturaṅgīṇīṃ senāṃ yojayitvā paracakragamanāya svaviṣayānniṣkrānto bhavet /
S04bsu035_u:57_10: yatrāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sutrendrarājo bhavet sa pratiśatrurājaḥ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyena taṃ viṣayamupasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet /
S04bsu035_u:57_11_0: taṃ vināśitukāmo bhavet / te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavañcatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā
S04bsu035_u:57_12: yathā ca tatparacakraṃ na śakṣyati tatra viṣaya upasaṃkramitum /
S04bsu035_u:58_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu035_u:58_1: sādhu sādhu mahārājāḥ sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ mahārājānām /
S04bsu035_u:58_2_1: teṣāṃ manuṣyarājānāmasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāmārakṣāṃ
S04bsu035_u:58_4: tāni ca rājakulāni tāni nagarāṇi tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇyārakṣayiṣyatha /
S04bsu035_u:58_5: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyatha /
S04bsu035_u:58_9_0: yathā ca te yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmasmiñjambudvīpe teṣu caturṣu
S04bsu035_u:58_9_1: nagarasahasreṣu tāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣvabhirameyustena
S04bsu035_u:58_9_2: ca rājyaiśvaryeṇābhirameyustena ca dhanaskandhena parasparaṃ na viheṭhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:58_11: svena ca yathā pūrvakarmopacayena rājatvaṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:58_12: svena ca rājyaiśvaryeṇa ca tuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:59_0_0: yathā cāsmiñjambudvīpe teṣu caturaśītiṣu viṣayanagarasahasreṣu tāni caturaśītirāja
S04bsu035_u:59_0_1: sahasrāṇi paraspareṇa hitacittāni maitrīcittāni sukhacittāni paraspareṇa kalahayābhaṇḍanayāvigrahayāvivādayā
S04bsu035_u:59_0_2: sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣvabhiramerantena puṇyena caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmayaṃ
S04bsu035_u:60_1_0: yatkaścinmahārājo bhaved ya itthamasya suvarṇaprabhāsattamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā
S04bsu035_u:60_1_1: bhavenmānayitā ca pūjayitā ca teṣāṃ ca sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāmautsukyaṃ
S04bsu035_u:60_2: yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāmanukampārthāya satatasamitaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājendraṃ śṛṇvan /
S04bsu035_u:60_5: mahacca yuṣmākaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma balaṃ ca vapuṣaḥ saṃjanayet /
S04bsu035_u:60_7: tena ca manuṣyarājena mama śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyācintyā mahāvipulavistīrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_8: tena tasya manuṣyarājenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāmanekeṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ koṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmacintyā mahatī vistīrṇā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_9: tena tasya manuṣyarājasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_10: tena ca tasya rājño rakṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_11: agramahiṣyāśca rājaputrāṇāṃ ca sarvāntaḥpurasya ca rājakulasya ca sarvasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_12: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:60_13: rājakulanivāsanyaśca sarvadevatā ojovattarāśca cittena sukhasaumanasyena samanvāgatā bhavitāro ratimanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:60_14: tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇi cārakṣitāni bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:61_0: evamukte vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārājaste sarve bhagavantametadavocan /
S04bsu035_u:61_1: tena ca bhagavanmanuṣyarājena susnātagātreṇa bhavitavyaṃ sugandhavāsanadhāriṇā navaruciravastraprāvṛtena nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu035_u:61_7: tena manuṣyarājena tasminkāle tasmitsamaye 'gramahiṣī rājaputrāśca rājaduhitaraśca sarvāntaḥpuragaṇāśca [Bagchi_42] priyahitābhyāṃ prekṣitavyāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:62_1: tasmiṃśca khalu pugarmahārajāḥ kāle tasminsamaye tena manuṣyarājena sarvaśvetāni pāṇḍurāṇi navarucivastrāṇi prāvaritavyāni /
S04bsu035_u:62_3: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājavyūhena nānāvicitraratnamaṅgalaparigṛhītaistato rājakulādabhiniṣkramitavyam /
S04bsu035_u:62_4: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pratyudgamanāya gantavyam /
S04bsu035_u:62_5_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? yāvanti manuṣyarājastatra padāni bhāvayati tāvanti kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu035_u:62_6: yāvanti sa tatra padānyatikramiṣyati tāvatāṃ caiva dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhiṣyate /
S04bsu035_u:62_8: anekeṣāṃ ca divyodārāṇāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ rājakulaputraśatasahasrāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:62_10: dīrghāyuṣkaśca bhaviṣyati / ciraṃjīvī ca bhaviṣyati / pratibhāṇavāṃścādeyavacanaśca yaśasvī ca suviśālakīrtiśca bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:62_12: udārodārāṇāṃ ca divyamānuṣyakāṇāṃ sukhānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:62_13: mahābalaśca mahānagnabalavegadhārī cābhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataśca bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:63_0: imanyevaṃrūpāṇi mahārājaguṇānuśaṃsāni saṃpaśyamānena tena rājñā dharmabhāṇako yojanātpratyutthātavyaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:63_2: evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam / adya mama śākyamunistathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddha iha rājakule pravekṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:63_3: adya mama śākyamunistathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddha iha rājakule svajanamanuśasiṣyate /
S04bsu035_u:63_7: adya mayātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacintyā mahatī vipulā vistīrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:63_14: adya mama sarvāntaḥpurasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:63_15: adya mama rājakule 'cintyā samabiśiṣṭānuttarā mahatī śāntiḥ kṛtā bhaviṣyati svastyayanaṃ ca /
S04bsu035_u:64_0_0: yadā ca mahārājāḥ sa manuṣyarājo 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa saddharmagauraveṇa suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājadhārakā
S04bsu035_u:64_0_2: sabalaparivārāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devagaṇānāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāṃ mahā tathā
S04bsu035_u:64_0_3: dharmāṅgapratyakṣaṃ dadyāt yena caivāsau manuṣyarājaḥ puṇyabhisaṃskāreṇa kuśalābhisaṃskāreṇa
S04bsu035_u:64_0_4: ca tenaiva cātmabhāvena ca dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhayiṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:64_2: śriyā ca tejasā ca lakṣmyā cālaṃkṛto bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:65_2: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta bhagavanmanuṣyarājo bhavet so 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa dharmagauraveṇemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇuyāt /
S04bsu035_u:65_4: asmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmarthāya tadrājakulaṃ suśodhitaṃ śodhayet /
S04bsu035_u:65_6: taṃ ca dharmaśrāvaṇamasmābhiścaturbhiśca mahārājaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ śṛṇyādātmano 'rthāya sarvadevatā ca kiṃcinmātraṃ kuśalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu035_u:65_7: samantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya bhikṣordhamāsanagatasya tena manuṣyarājenāsmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmarthāya nānāgandhā dhūpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:65_8: sahadhūpiteṣu bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjārthāya nānāgandheṣu nānāgandhadhūpalatā niścaranti /
S04bsu035_u:65_9: tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte 'smākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ svakasvakabhavanagatānyuparyantarīkṣe nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
S04bsu035_u:65_13_0: brahmaṇaḥ sahāṃpateḥ śakrasya ca devānāmindrasya sarasvatyāśca mahādevyā dṛḍhāyāśca
S04bsu035_u:65_13_1: mahādevyāḥ śriyaśca mahādevyāḥ saṃjayasya ca mahāyakṣasenāpateraṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ ca
S04bsu035_u:65_13_2: mahāyakṣasenāpatīnaṃ maheśvarasya ca devaputrasya vajrapāṇeśca mahāyakṣasenāpatermāṇibhadrasya
S04bsu035_u:66_1: na kevalaṃ yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ svakasvakabhavanagatānāmuparyantarīkṣagatāti nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
S04bsu035_u:66_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? sahapradhūpitāśca mahārājāstena manuṣyarājena nānāgandhā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjopasthānāya /
S04bsu035_u:66_4_0: tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena sarvasyāmasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yatra
S04bsu035_u:66_4_1: koṭīśataṃ candrāṇāṃ [Bagchi_45] koṭīśataṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājānāṃ koṭīśataṃ cakravāḍamahācakravāḍānāṃ
S04bsu035_u:66_4_2: parvatarājānāṃ koṭīśataṃ caturmahādvīpānāṃ koṭīśataṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ
S04bsu035_u:66_4_3: koṭīśataṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ koṭīśataṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānām /
S04bsu035_u:66_5_0: sarvatra ca teṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātukoṭīśateṣu trayastriṃśeṣu devanikāyeṣu
S04bsu035_u:66_12: yathā trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvadevabhavanānyuparyantarīkṣe tāni nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
S04bsu035_u:66_13_0: tathā cāsya mahārājāḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya tejasā kuṇḍahastena
S04bsu035_u:66_13_1: dhūpitāstena manuṣyarājena nānāgandhā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya
S04bsu035_u:66_18_0: samanantaraprādurbhūtāni ca mahārājā imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāprātihāryāṇi tānyanekāni
S04bsu035_u:66_19: sādhukārāṇi ca pradāsyanti sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa sādhu punastvaṃ satpuruṣa /
S04bsu035_u:66_20: yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīramevaṃ gambhīrārthamevaṃ gambhīrāvabhāsamevamacintyaguṇadharmasamanvāgataṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:66_21: [Bagchi_46] na caite sattvā itareṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:66_23: prāgevodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S04bsu035_u:66_24: vistareṇa parṣadi saṃprakāśayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti /
S04bsu035_u:66_25: tatkasya hetoḥ? sahaśravaṇenāsya puruṣasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyānekāni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyavaivartikāni bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksabodheḥ /
S04bsu035_u:67_0_0: atha khalu tāni samantāddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣvanekāni
S04bsu035_u:67_0_1: tathāgatakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhitāni tena kālena
S04bsu035_u:67_2_0: pradarśayiṣyasi tvaṃ satpuruṣa bodhimaṇḍavarāgragato drumarājamūlopaviṣṭaḥ sarvatrailokyaprativiśiṣṭāni
S04bsu035_u:67_4: parājayiṣyasi tvaṃ satpuruṣa drumarājamūlopaviṣṭaḥ kṛtimarūpaparamabībhatsadarśanaṃ nānāvikṛtarūpamacintyamārasainyam /
S04bsu035_u:67_6: pravartayiṣyasi tvaṃ satpuruṣāryasāradṛḍhavajrāsanopaviṣṭaḥ sarvajanābhisaṃstutaṃ paramagambhīraṃ dvādaśākāramanuttaradharmacakram /
S04bsu035_u:68_2_2: saṃpaśyamānāste vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekairyakṣaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu035_u:68_2_3: sārdhaṃ svabhavanagatā nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāḥ saṃcoditāḥ samānā adṛśyairātmabhāvairyena
S04bsu035_u:68_3_0: brahmā ca sahāṃpatiḥ śakraśca devānāmindraḥ sarasvatī ca mahādevī śrīśca mahādevī
S04bsu035_u:68_3_3: ca pañcaputraśataparivārā anavataptaśca nāgarājaḥ sāgaraśca nāgarājaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:68_4_1: tatra ta nānālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtaṃ rājakulaṃ yatra tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ puṣpābhikīrṇāyāṃ
S04bsu035_u:68_4_2: dharaṇyāṃ śaucapragṛhītaṃ nānālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtaṃ yatra yatra dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ
S04bsu035_u:68_4_3: puṣpābhikīrṇāyaṃ dharaṇyāṃ śaucapragṛhītaṃ nānālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtaṃ yatra yatra dharmāsanaṃ
S04bsu035_u:69_0_0: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājā anekairyakṣaśatasahasrairebhiśca sarvaiḥ
S04bsu035_u:69_0_2: dharmāmṛtarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃtarpya tasya manuṣyarājasyārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:69_2: tasya rājakulasya ca nagarasya ca viṣayasya ca rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:70_1: yasya ca manuṣyarājasya viṣaye 'yaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ saṃpracaret /
S04bsu035_u:70_2: yadā cāsau bhadanta bhagavanmanuṣyarājaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya [Bagchi_48] dhārakān bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na satkuryānna gurukuryānna mānayenna pūjayet /

S04bsu035_u:168_0: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro 'nupūrveṇānucaṅkramannanuvicaranyatrāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tatra saṃprāptaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:168_2: sa tatrāpaśyadbahūni matsyaśatāni jalaviprahīṇāni tatrāsya kāruṇyacittamutpannam /
S04bsu035_u:168_5: sādhu sādhu [Bagchi_99] kulaputra yastvaṃ jalavāhano nāma matsyānāmudakaṃ prayaccha /
S04bsu035_u:169_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūyasyā mātrayā paramakāruṇyacittamutpannam /
S04bsu035_u:169_1: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate samayenāṭavīsaṃbhavāyāṃ puṣkariṇyā kiṃcinmātramavaśiṣṭamudakamabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:170_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaścaturdiśaṃ dhāvati sma /
S04bsu035_u:170_1: yasyāṃ diśi jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nucaṅkamati tasyāṃ diśi daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jalavāhanaṃ karuṇaṃ prekṣante /
S04bsu035_u:170_2: / atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaścaturdiśaṃ dhāvati sma /
S04bsu035_u:170_4: caturdiśaṃ prekṣate / so 'drākṣīnnātidūre mahāntaṃ vṛkṣasamūhaṃ taṃ vṛkṣamabhiruhya drumaśākhāñchittvā yena sā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma /
S04bsu035_u:170_5: upagamya teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāṃ drumaśākhābhiḥ suśītalāñchāyāṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu035_u:171_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ puṣkariṇyāmudakāgamaṃ paryeṣate kuta udakasyāgamanaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu035_u:171_3: tasyāḥ khalu punaḥ kuladevate aṭavīsaṃbhavāyāḥ puṣkariṇyā jalāgamā nāma mahānadī yatastasyāmudakasyāgamanam /
S04bsu035_u:171_4_0: tena ca samayena sā ndyanyatareṇa pāpasattvena teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāmarthena
S04bsu035_u:171_4_1: sā nadītyadṛṣṭe sthāne mahāprapāte pātitā yatteṣāṃ matsyānāṃ na bhūya udakasyāgamanaṃ
S04bsu035_u:171_5: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayati na śakyata eṣā nadī janasahasreṇāpi tenaiva yathā vāhayituṃ kimaṅga punarmayaikena śakyo bāhayituṃ sa pratinivṛttaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:172_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputraḥ śīghraṃ śīghramupasaṃkrānto yena rājā [Bagchi_100] sureśvaprabhastenopajagāma /
S04bsu035_u:172_1: upagamya rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya pādau śirasā natvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:172_2: imāṃ prakṛtimārocayāti sma / mayā khalu devasya viṣaye sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu sattvānāṃ vyādhayaḥ praśamitāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:172_5: taddadātu me devo viṃśatigajā yathā teṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ jīvitaṃ dadāmīti /
S04bsu035_u:172_6: yathā manuṣyāṇāṃ dattamājñaptaṃ khalu rājñā sureśvaraprabheṇāmātyānāṃ dadata mahāvaidyarājasya viṃśatigajān /
S04bsu035_u:172_7: amātyā āhuḥ / upasaṃkrama mahāsattva yena hastiśālā upagṛhṇīṣva viṃśatigajān kuru sattvānāṃ sukham /
S04bsu035_u:173_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ sārdhaṃ jalāmbareṇa ca svaputreṇa viṃśatigajān gṛhītvā nāgaśauṇḍikānāṃ sakāśācchataśo dṛśīnāṃ pratigṛhya pratinivṛttaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:173_2: tatropasaṃkramyodakena tā dṛtīḥ pūrayitvā gajapṛṣṭha udakamāropya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:173_3: upasaṃkramya tadudakaṃ hastipṛṣṭhādavatārya tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ caturdiśamudakena pūrayitvā caturdiśaṃ ca kramati /
S04bsu035_u:173_4: yena yena jalavāhano 'nucaṅkramati tena tena daśamatsyasahasrāṇyanudhāvanti /
S04bsu035_u:174_2: tasya punaretadabhavat / nūnamete matsyāḥ kṣudhāgninā paripīḍitā mama sakāśādbhojanaṃ parimārgayanti /
S04bsu035_u:175_0: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ svaputraṃ jalāmbarametadavocat /
S04bsu035_u:175_1_0: gaccha kulaputra svakaṃ niveśanaṃ sarvabalataraṃ hastinamabhirūhya ca śīdhraṃ śīghramupasaṃkramya
S04bsu035_u:175_1_1: pitāmahasya śreṣṭhina evaṃ vadeha bho tāta jalavāhana evaṃ vadati yatkiṃcidatra gṛhe
S04bsu035_u:175_1_3: kṛtaśaḥ sarvamekatra piṇḍīkṛtvā jalāmbarasya hastipṛṣṭamavaropya jalavāhanāya śīghraṃ
S04bsu035_u:176_0: atha khalu jalāmbaro dārako hastinamabhiruhya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ dhāvati sma /
S04bsu035_u:176_1: yena svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmadupasaṃmyaitāṃ prakṛtaṃ pitāmahasyāgra ārocayāmāsa vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktam /
S04bsu035_u:177_0: atha khalu jalambaro dārakastadbhojanaṃ hastipṛṣṭhamupanāmya hastinamabhiruhya yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu035_u:178_0: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ jalāmbaramāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagraḥ putrasyāntikādbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya cchittvā tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu035_u:178_2: punastasyaitadabhavat / śrutaṃ me pareṇa kālasamayenāraṇyāyatane bhikṣurmahāyānadhārayamāna ityāha /
S04bsu035_u:178_3: yo ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya maraṇakālasamaye nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyāt /
S04bsu035_u:178_5: yannūnamahameṣāṃ matsyānāṃ gambhīraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
S04bsu035_u:178_7: tena ca samayena tasmiñjambudvīpe dvighādṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāmabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:179_0: atha khalu punarjalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrastasyāṃ velāyāmubhau pādau jānumātraṃ tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ praveśyaivaṃ cidānamudānayāmāsa /
S04bsu035_u:179_1: namastasya bhagavato ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya purvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya evaṃ praṇidhānamabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:179_2: ye keciddaśasu dikṣu maraṇakālasamaye mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste tataścyutvā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:180_1: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu035_u:180_4: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
S04bsu035_u:180_5_0: ṣaḍāyatanapratyaya sparśaḥ / sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam /
S04bsu035_u:180_5_2: bhavatyevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati yadutāvidyānirodhātsaṃrakāranirodhaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:180_16: iti hi kuladevate tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimāṃ dhārmikakathāṃ kathayati sma /
S04bsu035_u:180_17: sārdhaṃ putrābhyāṃ jalāmbareṇa jalagarbheṇa ca punarapi svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:181_0: athāpareṇa kālena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro mahotsavaṃ paribhujya mahotsavamatto śayane śayitaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:181_1: tena ca kālena tena samayena mahānimittaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:181_2: yattasyā rātryāmatyayena tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi kālagatāni deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsu sabhāgatāyāmupapannāni /
S04bsu035_u:181_6: te vayaṃ tiryagyonigatā jalavāhanena śreṣṭhidārakeṇa prabhūtenodakena saṃtarpitā bhojanavareṇa ca /
S04bsu035_u:181_9: [Bagchi_103] tena kuśaladharmahetunā tena pratyayeneha vayaṃ deveṣūpapannāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:182_0: atha tāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsvantarhitāni jalavāhanasya śriṣṭhino gṛhe tasthuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:182_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ca jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭyupaśayane śayitaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:183_1_0: te ca devaputrā rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye sthānasthānāntare māndāravapuṣpavarṣaṃ
S04bsu035_u:183_1_1: pravarṣayanto yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ te tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ māndāravapuṣpaṃ
S04bsu035_u:183_3: krīḍanti sma / paricālayanti sma / mahatīṃ śrīsaubhāgyatāmanubhavanti sma /
S04bsu035_u:184_2: te 'vocan / yatkhalu devo jānīyāt / jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya catvāriṃśanmuktāhārasahasrāṇi pravarṣitāni divyāni ca māndāravapuṣpāṇi nirgacchanti /
S04bsu035_u:184_3: rājāha / bhavanto jalavāhanaṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ dārakaṃ priyavacanena śabdāpayan /
S04bsu035_u:185_0: atha te gaṇakamahāmātyā yena jalavāhanasya gṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu035_u:185_3: atha jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhī mahāmātyaiḥ sārdhaṃ yena rājā sureśvaraprabhastenopajagāma /
S04bsu035_u:185_5: rājā [Bagchi_104] pṛcchati / jalavāhana kiṃ nimittaṃ jānīyā yadadya rātrāvīdṛśāni śubhanimittāni prādurbhūtāni /
S04bsu035_u:185_8: rājāha / kathaṃ jānāsi / jalavāhana āha / gacchatu deva jalāmbarastāṃ mahāpuṣkariṇīṃ praviśatu /
S04bsu035_u:185_9: kiṃ tāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jīvanti atha kālagatāni /
S04bsu035_u:186_2: kiṃ tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi jivanti atha kālagatāni /
S04bsu035_u:186_3: atha jalāmbaro dārakaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma /
S04bsu035_u:186_4: upasaṃkramya dadarśa / tāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi kālagatāni mahāntaṃ ca māndāravapuṣpavarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā punarapi nivṛttaḥ pituretadavocat /
S04bsu035_u:186_5: kālagatānīti / atha jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhī dārako jalambarasya dārakasyāntikādidaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yena rājā sureśvaraprabhastenopasaṃkramyaitāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
S04bsu035_u:186_6: yatkhalu devo jānīyāttāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi sarvāṇi kālagatāni deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsvupapannāni /
S04bsu035_u:186_8: yadasmākaṃ gṛhe catvāriṃśanmuktāhārasahasrāṇi divyāni ca māndāravapuṣpāṇi pravarṣitāni /
S04bsu035_u:186_9: atha sa rājā hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagrāttamanā babhūva /
S04bsu035_u:187_1: / syātkhalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kuladevate 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sureśvaraprabho nāma rājā babhūva /
S04bsu035_u:187_3: tatkasya hetoḥ / daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyastena kālena tena samayena sureśvaraprabho nāma rājā babhūva /
S04bsu035_u:187_4: syātkhalu punaḥ kuladevate 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jaṭiṃdharo nāma śreṣṭhī babhūva /
S04bsu035_u:187_6: tatkasya hetoḥ / rājā śuddhodanaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jaṭiṃdharo nāma śreṣṭhyabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_1: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_3: tatkasya hetoḥ / ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_4: / syātkhalu punaste kuladevate 'nyā sā tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_6: tatkasya hetoḥ / gopā nāma śākyakanyā tena kālena samayena jalavāhanasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_7: rāhulabhadrastena kalena tena samayena jalāmbaro nāma dārako 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_8: ānandaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalagarbho nāma dārako 'bhūt /
S04bsu035_u:188_9: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate 'nyāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena daśamatsyasahasrāṇi babhūvaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:188_10: na punarevaṃ draṣṭavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ / amūni tāni jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena daśamatsyasahasrāṇi babhūvuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:188_12: bhojanavareṇa ca gambhīraśca pratītyasamutpādo dharmo deśitaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:188_14: tena kuśaladharmahetunā mamāntika ihāgatāni yenaitarhyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni /
S04bsu035_u:189_0: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate 'nyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vṛkṣadevatābhūt /
S04bsu035_u:189_1: naivaṃ draṣṭavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ / tvamabhūḥ kuladevate tena kālena tena samayena vṛkṣadevatā /
S04bsu035_u:189_3: yathā mayā saṃsāre saṃsaratā bahavaḥ sattvāḥ paripācitā bodhau /
S04bsu035_u:189_4: ye te sarve vyākaraṇabhūmiṃ pratilapsyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S04bsu035_u:193_2: sa tatra dadarśa haritamṛdunīlaśādvalatalavividhakusumapratimaṇḍitaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayati sma /
S04bsu035_u:193_8: prajñaptamāsanaṃ bhagavanniṣīda jṣṭheṣṭha śreṣṭha nṛṇāṃ varada variṣṭha mokṣavaha paramāmṛtakathāṃ visṛja nṛṇāṃ hitāya bhagavannidhanaviprayuktaṃ /
S04bsu035_u:193_10: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavo duṣkarakārikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śarīrāṇi draṣṭum /
S04bsu035_u:195_0: atha bhagavānsahasrāracakracaraṇavilikhitatalena sthūlitanavakamalakomalena pāṇinā dharaṇītalaṃ jaghāna vyāhatamātreṇa ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivī cacāla /
S04bsu035_u:195_3: vighāṭayānandemaṃ stūpam / athāyuṣmānānando bhagavate pratikṣutya stūpaṃ vighaṭayāmāsa /
S04bsu035_u:195_4: sa tatra dadarśa kanakavisṛtamuktāsaṃchāditaṃ hiraṇyamayaṃ samudrakam /
S04bsu035_u:196_3: imānyasthīni mahāpravaraguṇāmuktasya samantadamadhyānakṣāntipravaradṛḍhotsāhayaśaḥsaṃskṛto bhūyaḥ satatasamitaṃ bodhau matimato dṛḍhotsāhino dhṛtimataḥ sadādānaniratasya /
S04bsu035_u:196_5: vadanta bhikṣavo bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śīlaguṇavāsitāni paramadurlabhadarśanāni puṇyakṣetrabhūtāni /
S04bsu035_u:196_6: tataste bhikṣavaḥ kṛtakarapuṭā āvarjitamanasastāni śarīrāṇi mūrdhnā vandante sma /
S04bsu035_u:197_9: te ca kumārāstasyodyānasya guṇānurādhitayā kusumalolayā cetastato 'nuvicaramānā mahādvādaśavanagulmaṃ praviviśuḥ /
S04bsu035_u:197_13: bhīrme hṛdayamāviśate / āgacchata mā vayaṃ śvāpade vināśamāpadyema /
S04bsu035_u:197_14: mahādeva uvāca / na me bhayamastyapi tviṣṭajanaviyogāddhi me hṛdaye pravartate /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.2_0: na ca mama bhayamihāsti nāpi śoko vanavare munijanasaṃstute vivikte /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.2_1: paramasuvipulamahārthatā lābhā hṛdayamidaṃ mama saṃprapuṣpati ca //
S04bsu035_u:198_1_0: atha te rājakumārāstad dvādaśavanagulmavivaraṃ cañcūryamāṇā ekāṃ vyāghrīṃ dadṛśuḥ
S04bsu035_u:198_2: bho kaṣṭamiyaṃ tapasvinī ṣaḍahaprasutā vā saptāhaprasutā vā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:198_3: idānīṃ bhojanamalabhamānā svasutāni bhakṣayiṣyati jighatsayā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu035_u:199_0: mahādeva uvāca / ihaiṣā tapasvīnī kṣuttuṣaparītaśarīrā alaṃ prāṇāvaśeṣā paramadurbalā na śakyamanyasthāne bhojanamanveṣṭum /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.4_0: asmadvidhān duṣkara śarīra abhiyuktānāṃ eṣa nayaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.5_0: kṛpākaruṇamamavatāriya sattvo divi ceha labhyate saḥ /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.5_1: svadeha śataśa iha kṛtva muditamanāḥ parajīvaśarīre //
S04bsu035_u:201_0: atha te rājakumārāḥ paramasaṃdīptā eṣā vyāghrīti drutamanimiṣimanunirīkṣantaḥ pracaṅkramustato mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt /
S04bsu035_u:suv_19.6_2: śtanayakṛtadharmābhaidanāntairanantaṃ na vijahati anupūrvaṃ svasvabhāvaṃ kṛtaghnuḥ //

S04bsu035_u:224_1: tatra devena mahāsattvenāsyai vyāghryā ātmabhāvaṃ parityaktam /
S04bsu035_u:224_2: evaṃ rūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ karuṇayā kṛtam /

S04bsu035_u:224_4: asmindeśane nirdiśyamāna aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāḥ pra āyāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu035_u:224_7: sa ca stūpo buddhādhiṣṭhānena tatraivāntardhānamanuprāpta iti /
